name: Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen
description: Filled at any water source, including aRain Reservoir, the Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen is water tight and will not leak. The Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen remains filled between Prospects with the added ability to raise the Prospectors core temperature when consumed, making it a useful upgrade to theShengong 'Hulu' Canteen.
